ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Mystic Alliance on Rodcet
ygData.msgSnippet: Gates, As far as events go, we have only had 2 so far.   One was planned a week in advance, and one was planned the day of :)   Officers are encouraged to
ygData.messageBody:
Gates,

As far as events go, we have only had 2 so far. One was planned a week in
advance, and one was planned the day of :) Officers are encouraged to
organzize these events (thanks to Damarr for organizing both of the events
so far), but regular members are welcome to organize these events also.
Both of the events were so much fun, and I am sure more will be on the way
soon. Glad you are hvaing fun on rodcet Gates :)

-joe
Fentus Fayspark - Mystic Alliance
Rodcet Nife
----- Original Message -----
From: "Gates Councilor" <gatesc@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 9:40 AM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Mystic Alliance on Rodcet


> Hi all:
>
> Quick agreement to add to all. The Alliance on Rodcet has been (in the
short
> time since I started up there) extremely active. I'd like to ask about
> things like the event David was talking about, though. Do these things
> happen spontaneously, or are they planned out a few days in advance &
notice
> given, so folks have a chance to prep?
>
> But seriously, Rodcet rocks! Kerik & Genesius helped me with a 'starter
kit'
> (Some plat, some armor, nice weapon), and I was able to team up with
another
> player (Snapdragyn) who had also just restarted, and we helped each other
> level up some (although he's probably shot past me to 6 or 7 by now,
haven't
> you, Snap?<G>)
>
> Gates
>
> Thundyr, Wood Elf Druid of the 5th season
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "David Lari" <kerik@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 8:59 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] My Intro
>
>
> > I'd really like to encourage people who only have low level characters
to
> > come on over to the Rodcet Nife server. The event last night was
probably
> > the most fun I've ever had playing EQ. We had nine guild members on at
the
> > same time all fighting in South Ro. Prizes and cash were handed out,
too.
> We
> > had a level range from 5 up to 44. By the end of the event, 3 or 4
people
> > had leveled too.
> >
> > Since coming over to Rodcet and joining the guild, they have given me
lots
> > of neat items and spotted me much needed cash. We'll be happy to help
out
> > anyone else who wants to join us.
> >
> > David
> > Kerik, Wood Elf Druid, level 16
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Joseph J. Normandin <josephn@...>
> > To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 7:34 PM
> > Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] My Intro
> >
> >
> > > Hiya!
> > >
> > > Rodcet Nife had the most active guild from the list, Mystic Alliance.
> We
> > > just had a fun event last night fighting sand giants (higher-ups) and
> > madmen
> > > (lower lvl) and pumas (REALLY low) it was really fun :) If your
> > interested
> > > in joining the Mystic Alliance, just give a tell in-game to Fentus,
> > > Genesius, Damarr, Taren, Kerik, or Jaleth!
> > >
> > > -joe
> > > Fentus Fayspark
> > > Rodcet Nife
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: "Jose Antonio Muela" <redspieder@...>
> > > To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> > > Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 5:31 PM
> > > Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] My Intro
> > >
> > >
> > > > welcome glad to have you aboard :) i play on bristle bane and i am
not
> > > > sure what server is the most active with the gay guild but i am sure
> > > > others will let you know shortly :)
> > > >
> > > > Meropi wrote:
> > > > >
> > > > > Hi everyone,
> > > > >
> > > > > I'm a fairly new player to Everquest. I'm having fun learning to
> play
> > > > > the game. Everyone on there has been so helpful and nice. I play
on
> > > > > the Tunare server as a level 6 warrior named Giamarie. Yeah, I'm
an
> > > > > Angelina Jolie fan as you can maybe tell by my character name.
Hope
> > > > > to see some of you around :)
> > > > >
> > > >
> >
